title: Federal City's Secret
description: In the third book of Robin Murphy's paranormal mystery series, Dr. Marie Bartek and the Sullivanâ€™s Island Paranormal Society investigate hauntings and spirit activity in the heart of Washington, DC. Marie develops new nuances with her psychic abilities, bringing more depth and intrigue into their ghost investigations, but this lands the SIPS team in the middle of the mafia, politics, secret societies, and murder. Through the help of a spirit, Marie discovers that the mafia doesn't take kindly to strangers taking what isn't theirs. This story will captivate the reader with murder, suspense, and the world of the paranormal.
author: Robin  Murphy
